Subskills.name: Mirror Image
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by temporal heroes.

Subskills.name: Summon Carnage
Subskills.description: Increases the attack speed of temporal heroes.

Subskills.name: Augmented Heroics
Subskills.description: Temporal heroes gain augmented skills and increased damage.

Subskills.name: Larger Than Life
Subskills.description: Increases the life of temporal heroes.

Subskills.name: Quantum Immortality
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of temporal heroes.

Subskills.name: More Aid
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of temporal heroes.

Subskills.name: Accurate Clone
Subskills.description: Increases the skill levels of temporal heroes.

Subskills.name: Tough Bones
Subskills.description: Increases all resistances for temporal heroes.

Subskills.name: Summon Support
Subskills.description: Temporal heroes cast buffs when summoned. Viking casts combat orders, pyromancer casts fire shield and marksman casts agility.

Subskills.name: Heroes of the Ether
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit dealing increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Fractured Reality
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Evasive Strategy
Subskills.description: Increases the dodge chance of temporal heroes.

Subskills.name: The Four Horsemen
Subskills.description: Gain an additional temporal hero increasing the damage, life and movement speed of all temporal heroes.

Subskills.name: The Singularity
Subskills.description: Summon a temporal demonspawn with increased stats.
